text: THX 1138 is a 1971 movie and was the first feature movie directed by George Lucas and executive produced by Francis Ford Coppola and Coppola's production company American Zoetrope. It was based on a short film Lucas made in college in 1967 called Electric Labyrinth THX 1138 4EB. == Other websites == * Category:1971 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:Movies directed by George Lucas Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about mind control Category:Movies about rebellions Category:Movies about security and surveillance
title: THX 1138
